description:
This was a last minute add to the Farmstead Meadows line, and I am oh so happy that it was. I am in love! The full skirt, the amazing bell sleeves, the ric-rac neckline, the big pop of color buttons, the fabric... I could go on and on!

description:

My favorite feature of this dress is the great big bow in the back. If you prefer to have the bow on the shoulder, just continue one side of the tie through both back casings and your set.  And the separate bodice and skirt means you get a full dress without the bulkiness in the bodice. 

This dress is perfect paired with a long sleeve shirt and tights and will transition in to spring easily. And with all pillowcase dresses it will grow with your child for years to come.

name: Sunny Flowers Knotty Boho Bag
description:
These knotty boho bags are oh so fun! They are so unique and trendy. The handle length is completely adjustable (just retie the knot). The with two exterior and 4 large interior pockets there is tons of room for keeping things organized. 

Large - 19.5" x 15"
Medium - 15.5" x 12"
Mini - 12.5" x 9.5"

The large bag is big enough to use as a diaper bag or school bag. The medium is more of a large purse size. The mini bag is perfect for both little ones and adults who prefer smaller purses. The mini bag does not have interior pockets. 


THIS ITEM IS MADE TO ORDER.
